Name: Carels
Review Text: My wife, daughter and I recently had  a wonderful dinner at Carels. I had the lamb dish - possibly the best I've ever had! My daughter and wife shared the chateaubriand - fabulous! Our hostess was so friendly, we had plenty of laughs. What a treat!

Name: Carels
Review Text:
Ate there tonight, fabulous.  We had the prawns and monk fish, wow!
The chef, Vidas does terrific things with seafood.  We're going back on Friday.  Highly recommended!

Name: Carels
Review Text: Good food, great friendly staff. We had so much fun. I'll definitely go there next time I'm in Amsterdam and so should you

Name: Carels
Review Text: Had a good entrecôte here. Good wine, and friendly service and staff.

Name: Carels
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Great food, especially the chicken liver pate and the cod were good in taste. The service was attentive, friendly and not at all stiff. After a nice drink at the bar. If all in all a wonderful evening. …

Name: Carels
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Excellent restaurant and attention. The food first and the treatment is super cordial. The very comfortable atmosphere, with classical music and jazz. The meat very tender. Desserts with an artistic presentation. …

Name: Carels
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Good atmosphere. Wide range of beers. Eaten well at a normal price. …

Name: Carels
Review Text: (Translated by Google) Atmospheric. Great food. Spontaneous operation. Noisy though. One has to do something about the acoustics. …
